Sentence.string: You told me you “kindly” reminded his debts to Mr. Blayton, but his wife told me that you came to their house.
Listen detective, I really needed the money… So I came to his home on Saturday and I unexpectedly met his wife.
I tried to frighten her a bit. I said to myself that if she were scared, she could put pressure on her husband… But nothing more detective, I promise.
